Digital Marketing Specialist Ciudad de México (Distrito Federal) Salario no mostrado por compañía. Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Tiempo Completo, Permanente,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Telemarketing Bring your digital skills in social media and creative visuals to our global Social Media Team at TTEC!  What you'll be doing:You, our new Digital Marketing Specialist in Talent Acquisition, will have global reach through your efforts in paid social, organic engagement, and creative design. You'll manage our online social audience of current, past, and future employees via TTEC's social channels, bringing a local voice to our employee culture. Additionally, you'll be crucial to our paid social strategy, working with internal team members to find the right person at the right time for our career opportunities.  You'll need a dynamic combination of skills and experience in paid social, campaign creation, reporting on social analytics, and driving organic engagement. Why? Because you'll be key to our global team's evolution into new realms of social media and digital innovation. Because you're proficient with the mainstream platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube and Twitter) as well as trendy enough to try the more niche platforms (Snapchat and TikTok), you'll help our team succeed at our global mission to empower all of our colleagues to truly #ExperienceTTEC.  What you'll bring to us: Own the social media strategy and campaigns across platforms (i.e. Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn and YouTube) for one of TTEC's regional markets.Support our global Social Media Team with all TTEC regions as needed, bringing your team spirit and energy to our collaborative approach.Measure channel growth and performance while brainstorming ways to innovate and improve.Build brand awareness by ensuring a consistent and positive social media presence for TTEC on your managed accounts.Develop contests and innovative content that promote our team culture while positioning the TTEC brand positively on social.Support talent acquisition through both paid and organic social to maintain our employer brand and entice our employee audience to engage.Work with cross-functional teams to ensure maximum ROI in our social media advertising. You will be the social media expert for your internal points of contact.Daily monitor TTEC's social media presence by responding to public comments and questions.Knowledge share with the team your evolving skills in web and social technologies.Use your initiative to anticipate trends and develop ideas for how TTEC can stay ahead in the social media space.  What skills you'll need: Bachelor's degree is preferred, ideally in Communications, PR, Marketing or Digital Media.English/Spanish Bilingual is required, including excellent written communication skills in both languages.Three or more years of paid social experience in B2B or B2C social media marketing.Proficiency with Adobe Creative Cloud (ideally Photoshop and Premiere at minimum). Video editing skills are a plus!Experience managing and measuring social media campaigns, including paid ads, as well as working with internal stakeholders to meet business goals. Experience with social media analytics, both natively and through social media management tools (such as Hootsuite or Sprout Social).Strong interpersonal, analytical, problem-solving, and presentation skills paving the way for your successful projects with colleagues at all levels.You will be asked to present work samples and to complete a social media exercise to assess your proficiencies

STRATEGY & MARKETING LEAD México Salario no mostrado por compañía. Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Permanente,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Telemarketing En Siemens Healthineers, nos apasiona permitir que los profesionales de la salud brinden atención de alta calidad a los pacientes.
Siemens Healthineers, una de las principales compañías de Salud a nivel mundial, continúa reforzando su cartera de imágenes médicas y diagnósticos de laboratorio, al tiempo que agrega nuevas ofertas como servicios administrados, consultoría y servicios de TI de atención médica, así como otras tecnologías en el creciente mercado de diagnósticos terapéuticos y moleculares.
Siemens Healthineers desarrolla innovaciones que respaldan mejores resultados para los pacientes con mayor eficiencia, brindando a los proveedores la confianza que necesitan para enfrentar los desafíos clínicos, operativos y financieros de un cambiante panorama de la atención médica.

Roles & Responsabilidades
Identificar, desarrollar e implementar oportunidades para crear un nuevo negocio de servicios para Siemens Healthcare y para respaldar a su organización local, en cuestiones de marketing de servicios. Desarrollar estrategias de mercadeo, ofertas, métodos de comunicación orientados al mercado y al cliente. Desarrollar nuevos servicios y oportunidades, despliegue e implementación en la gestión de productos del país. Lanzar campañas especiales dentro del entorno de servicio.
Requerimientos
Formación: Lic. en Marketing y afines
Ingles intermedio - Avanzado
Disponibilidad para viajar en México( media)
Conocimiento de la industria

Shopper Marketing Specialist México Salario no mostrado por compañía. Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Permanente,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Telemarketing SHOPPER MARKETING SPECIALIST


DESCRIPTION
A career in Brand Management at P&G involves combining world-class marketing mastery with business leadership to create and build brands that improve consumers' lives. Did you know P&G invented the concept of brands and brand management? Over the years, we have remained consistently on the cutting-edge of marketing, always finding new and exciting ways to reach consumers, from the classic store to the most sophisticated digital technology. Therefore, some of the world's best marketing pros and business leaders started at P&G. Our brand management philosophy can be summed up in a simple concept: “Consumer is boss.”

You will have brand and business responsibility for your category from Day 1 and be responsible for maintaining and building the strength of the brand equity in consumers' minds through advertising, media, and trial-driving programs. You will work in a multifunctional team and in close collaboration with agencies to deliver effective brand building plans in the local markets.

WHAT P&G WILL OFFER YOU

Responsibilities from Day 1 ? You will feel ownership of your work from the beginning in a non-management position.
Recognized state of the art marketing skills ? We will constantly help you improve your marketing knowledge.
Continuous coaching & mentorship? We are passionate about our work. We will make sure you receive both formal training and as regular mentorship from your manager.
Dynamic, creative and supportive work environment ? employees are at the core, we value every individual and encourage initiatives, promoting agility and work/life balance.

JUST SO YOU KNOW, #WESEEEQUAL

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company;
Our people are all equally talented in unique ways: we come from diverse traditions, personal experiences and points of view. And we want to include yours. Are you ready to inspire us with your unrivaled ideas?

QUALIFICATIONS
We are looking for:
Eligibility to work in Mexico City (Interlomas)
People with Bachelor (Preferably industrial designers)
POP materials / production experience
+4 years' work experience in agencies
Collaboration skills, creativity and operational discipline
Intermediate English language
Salary range: 18 ? 25K (depending on experience)
Job locations:
México, Distrito Federal
Job Type: Full-time
Req No: BRM00001418

Marketing Senior Manager RX México Salario no mostrado por compañía. Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Permanente,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Telemarketing MARKETING SENIOR MANAGER RX


DESCRIPTION
We are seeking talents for our Parque Toreo Offices for the position of
MARKETING MANAGER MEXICO AND CENTRAL AMERICA- CONSUMER HEALTH DISTRIBUTION
Start date: as soon as possible.

Work schedule: Full time.

Profile: College graduated Ideally Marketing, Business Administration, or any related field. (master's desirable).

Qualifications: 8 years of professional experience in marketing (70% in RX pharmaceutical product and 30% OTC/ consumer goods products).
DESCRIPTION:
Are you seeking to transform our Consumer Health business continue building the world's leading brands experiences, making a difference for nearly 5 billion consumers? Then we have the perfect opportunity for you!
We're looking for someone who loves to develop the future of our business. How? With a winning mindset and be passionate for engage and energize to others to achieve the goals on a pharmaceutical industry.
YOUR ROLE AS MARKETING MANAGER IN HEALTH CARE BUSINESS WILL BE:
Love to lead and define 360° brand strategies and guarantee business growth, evolution and development of the brands across all channels.
You ought to promote the effective implementation of marketing campaigns, growing brand value and image through selection, evaluation and approval of the appropriate media, regarding product profile: consumer, doctor, shopper.
Market planning (promotion, advertising, digital, price, point of sales, etc.) according to the deep understanding of the consumer to create and develop true "love brands".
You will conquer and build positive relationships with medical community and increase prescriptions according to a full knowledge of the business model of prescription products.
Genuine care to continue medical education and creation of value for physicians.
You will promote digital innovation via e-commerce and omni channel strategies (e-reps, eCME, CME, newsletters, direct mail, etc.)
Budget management, to ensure the return of investment, as well as seek optimization model via alignment between the region.
You will develop business cases to analyze the feasibility of new products and / or line extensions, generating business value for the brands assigned.
You will lead and take care for the career of 10 team workers.
You will follow the "Good Marketing Practices", based on the regulation of the Compliance Officer.
WHAT WE OFFER:
A managerial position in a Brand team from the P&G Health organization.
Significant work from your first day and every single day learning.
Environment multifunctional collaboration and high level of interaction with managers and directors who will develop your skills.
Competitive salary and a benefit package.
Dynamic and supportive international work environment ? employees are at the core, we value every individual and urge initiatives, promoting agility and work/life balance.
JUST SO YOU NOW:
We are an equal opportunity employer. We don't discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, gender, age, citizenship, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, or any other legally protected factor. Our people are all equally talented in extraordinary ways: we come from diverse traditions, personal experiences and points of view. And we want to include yours. Are you ready to encourage us with your ideas?


QUALIFICATIONS
Be and expert on marketing and /or sales pharmaceutical industry with prescription products and consumer industry, product launches, market research and advertising campaigns.

DESCRIPTION
We are seeking talents for our Parque Toreo Offices for the position of
OTC Marketing Manager México P&G Health Care
Start date: as soon as possible.
Work schedule: Full time.
Profile: College graduated Ideally Marketing, Commercial Engineer, or Administration ideally with a master´s degree
Qualifications: 8 years' experience in marketing or pharmaceutical/industrial purchases, product launches, publicity campaigns.
Description:
Do you want to work with brands that millions of consumers can't live without? Are you eager to gain work experience in the largest Consumer Goods Company in the world?
Then we have the perfect opportunity for you!
We're looking for someone who displays the necessary abilities to coordinate and execute events, conventions, trainings. Together, we will continue to build the world's leading brand experiences and make a difference for nearly 5 billion consumers.
Aiding the Consumer Health department in marketing, sell to strive the business' objectives.
Your role as Marketing Manager Mexico:
You will be offered a managerial position in a Brand team from the P&G Health organization.
Leader and responsible of the growth, evolution and development of brands assigned to Mexico.
Design the strategy for the appliance and follow up of the marketing plan, with the intention of striving the sells objectives, market participation and rentability.
To propel the effective implementation of the broad marketing campaign to increase the value and image of the brand through selection, evaluation and approval of te media according to the product profile: consumer, medical, shopper
To define the marketing plan (promotion, publicity, digital publicity, price, point of distribution) conferred to the profound understanding of the consumer to craft and strengthen the "love for the brand".
Conquer the medical community through a strategy and increase the prescription based on integral knowledge of the business model.
Assure the compliance of the marketing global strategy, adjusted to every countries needs.
To propel digital innovation via e-commerce and Omni channel strategies(e-reps, eCME, CME, newsletters, direct mail, etc).
Arrange, elaborate and manage the marketing budget with the purpose of optimizing management and carry out for the investment repayment (return on investment).
Flourish and lead the “Business Case” to endeavor the new product feasibility, as well as to aid identifying new growth opportunities that generate value for the assigned brands.
Lead, thrive and motivate your team.
Accomplish the Good Practices of Marketing based on the Compliance Officer regulation.
Follow the Environmental Management System of the department.
What we offer:
Significant work from your first day and every single day learning.
Environment multifunctional collaboration and high level of interaction with managers and directors who will develop your skills.
Competitive salary and a benefit package.
Dynamic and supportive international work environment ? employees are at the core, we value every individual and urge initiatives, promoting agility and work/life balance.

Just so you now:
We are an equal opportunity employer. We don't discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, gender, age, citizenship, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, or any other legally protected factor. Our people are all equally talented in extraordinary ways: we come from diverse traditions, personal experiences and points of view. And we want to include yours. Are you ready to encourage us with your ideas?

QUALIFICATIONS
Expertise on marketing focusing on pharmaceutic and costumer goods.
Experience with OTC products. Indispensable having experience in prescription products. (80% OTC + 20% RX).
Opinion leaders management, societies and medical associations.
Strong communication skills with a customer service orientation / attitude
Strong Leadership Skills, you will lead in the envisioning of the future of your business, to engage / enable / energize the multifunctional team and execute plans with perfection.
Strong oral and written English interpersonal skills.

Gerente de Logística - Materiales Querétaro Salario no mostrado por compañía. Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Permanente,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Gerencia de Mercadotecnia Job Description
Los lugares de TrabajoMX-QUE-El Marques
Fecha de Publicación1 month ago(3/21/2019 8:39 PM)
ID2019-4820# De Aperturas1CategoríaLogistics
Descripción de la Empresa
Flex-N-Gate es una empresa líder en manufactura y proveedor de diversos componentes para la industria automotriz, actualmente se encuentra en la posición número 10 de los 150 Mejores Proveedores de Norte América según "Noticias Automotrices". Una importante compañía en crecimiento, Flex-N-Gate representa una gran oportunidad laboral para personas calificadas.
Responsabilidades
- Extensive experience in Materials Management, leading activities such as Planning, Receiving area, Production Scheduling, Customer Service, Shipping and Invoicing.
- Ability to coordinate several tasks simultaneously.
- Ability to handle challenges with proven history of increased productivity.
- Dynamic, results- oriented, problem solver.
- Extensive knowledge of fleet operations, including how they are best deployed to profitably support manufacturing operations.
- Ability to develop and direct staff to support an effective fleet operation.
- Knowledge of DOT rules and regulations as applicable to private fleet operations with ability to translate knowledge into compliant programs and operational practices.
- Ability to identify, document and correct practices in support of continuous improvement.
Perfil de puesto / Requerimientos / Conocimientos / Certificaciones
- 5-10 years as Materials Manager in automotive industry
- 3-5 years with analysis of traffic lanes, rate negotiations and carrier development.
- Bachelor Degree in business administration or industrial engineering.
- Excellent organizational and negotiation skills to effectively plan, organize and manage multiple projects and set priorities.
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
- Experience with all PC and MS office programs, AS400 and other related systems.
- Experience with ground transportation operations including DOT, OSHA and all related safety regulations.
- Ability to work in a fast paced environment, handle multiple tasks simultaneously, maintain highest work ethics, team oriented with strong interpersonal skills to develop relationships.
- Ability to read, analyzes, and interprets general business periodicals, professional journals, technical procedures, or governmental regulations.
- Demonstrated success in leading, supervising, managing and developing high performance teams.
- Completion of regulatory sponsored training programs applicable to fleet operations as they are published/made available. 
- Master Degree in Logistic, Administration or Industrial Engineering (desirable)
Prestaciones
Aguinaldo
Vacaciones
Prima Vacacional
Fondo de Ahorro (No aplica para todas las plantas)
Vales de Despensa
Seguro de Vida
Seguro de Gastos Médicos Mayores
Ámbito de aplicación de la Posición
Direct and coordinate the activities of the personnel involved in some or all of the following areas; Materials planning, distribution, inventory control,
material analysis, procurement and supply chain management are also responsible for managing all aspects of material flow to maintain control and accuracy of all merchandise inventories, including all the transactions, acquisitions, planning, programming, costs, warehouse, reception and shipment to guarantee that the orders of the clients are fulfilled in time. This position is also responsible for developing and managing all relationships with suppliers.

DESCRIPTION
A career in Brand Management at P&G involves combining world-class marketing mastery with business leadership to create and build brands that improve consumers' lives. Did you know P&G invented the concept of brands and brand management? Over the years, we have remained consistently on the cutting-edge of marketing, always finding new and exciting ways to reach consumers, from the classic store to the most sophisticated digital technology. Therefore, some of the world's best marketing pros and business leaders started at P&G. Our brand management philosophy can be summed up in a simple concept: “Consumer is boss.”

You will have brand and business responsibility for your category from Day 1 and be responsible for maintaining and building the strength of the brand equity in consumers' minds through advertising, media, and trial-driving programs. You will work in a multifunctional team and in close collaboration with agencies to deliver effective brand building plans in the local markets.

WHAT P&G WILL OFFER YOU

Responsibilities from Day 1 ? You will feel ownership of your work from the beginning in a non-management position.
Recognized state of the art marketing skills ? We will constantly help you improve your marketing knowledge.
Continuous coaching & mentorship? We are passionate about our work. We will make sure you receive both formal training and as regular mentorship from your manager.
Dynamic, creative and supportive work environment ? employees are at the core, we value every individual and encourage initiatives, promoting agility and work/life balance.

JUST SO YOU KNOW, #WESEEEQUAL

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company;
Our people are all equally talented in unique ways: we come from diverse traditions, personal experiences and points of view. And we want to include yours. Are you ready to inspire us with your unrivaled ideas?

QUALIFICATIONS
We are looking for:
Eligibility to work in Mexico City (Interlomas)
People with Bachelor (Preferably industrial designers)
POP materials / production experience
+4 years' work experience in agencies
Collaboration skills, creativity and operational discipline
Intermediate English language
Salary range: 18 ? 25K (depending on experience)
Job locations:
México, Distrito Federal

DESCRIPTION
We are seeking talents for our Parque Toreo Offices for the position of
MARKETING MANAGER MEXICO AND CENTRAL AMERICA- CONSUMER HEALTH DISTRIBUTION
Start date: as soon as possible.

Work schedule: Full time.

Profile: College graduated Ideally Marketing, Business Administration, or any related field. (master's desirable).

Qualifications: 8 years of professional experience in marketing (70% in RX pharmaceutical product and 30% OTC/ consumer goods products).
DESCRIPTION:
Are you seeking to transform our Consumer Health business continue building the world's leading brands experiences, making a difference for nearly 5 billion consumers? Then we have the perfect opportunity for you!
We're looking for someone who loves to develop the future of our business. How? With a winning mindset and be passionate for engage and energize to others to achieve the goals on a pharmaceutical industry.
YOUR ROLE AS MARKETING MANAGER IN HEALTH CARE BUSINESS WILL BE:
Love to lead and define 360° brand strategies and guarantee business growth, evolution and development of the brands across all channels.
You ought to promote the effective implementation of marketing campaigns, growing brand value and image through selection, evaluation and approval of the appropriate media, regarding product profile: consumer, doctor, shopper.
Market planning (promotion, advertising, digital, price, point of sales, etc.) according to the deep understanding of the consumer to create and develop true "love brands".
You will conquer and build positive relationships with medical community and increase prescriptions according to a full knowledge of the business model of prescription products.
Genuine care to continue medical education and creation of value for physicians.
You will promote digital innovation via e-commerce and omni channel strategies (e-reps, eCME, CME, newsletters, direct mail, etc.)
Budget management, to ensure the return of investment, as well as seek optimization model via alignment between the region.
You will develop business cases to analyze the feasibility of new products and / or line extensions, generating business value for the brands assigned.
You will lead and take care for the career of 10 team workers.
You will follow the "Good Marketing Practices", based on the regulation of the Compliance Officer.
WHAT WE OFFER:
A managerial position in a Brand team from the P&G Health organization.
Significant work from your first day and every single day learning.
Environment multifunctional collaboration and high level of interaction with managers and directors who will develop your skills.
Competitive salary and a benefit package.
Dynamic and supportive international work environment ? employees are at the core, we value every individual and urge initiatives, promoting agility and work/life balance.

DESCRIPTION
We are seeking talents for our Parque Toreo Offices for the position of
OTC Marketing Manager México P&G Health Care
Start date: as soon as possible.
Work schedule: Full time.
Profile: College graduated Ideally Marketing, Commercial Engineer, or Administration ideally with a master´s degree
Qualifications: 8 years' experience in marketing or pharmaceutical/industrial purchases, product launches, publicity campaigns.
Description:
Do you want to work with brands that millions of consumers can't live without? Are you eager to gain work experience in the largest Consumer Goods Company in the world?
Then we have the perfect opportunity for you!
We're looking for someone who displays the necessary abilities to coordinate and execute events, conventions, trainings. Together, we will continue to build the world's leading brand experiences and make a difference for nearly 5 billion consumers.
Aiding the Consumer Health department in marketing, sell to strive the business' objectives.
Your role as Marketing Manager Mexico:
You will be offered a managerial position in a Brand team from the P&G Health organization.
Leader and responsible of the growth, evolution and development of brands assigned to Mexico.
Design the strategy for the appliance and follow up of the marketing plan, with the intention of striving the sells objectives, market participation and rentability.
To propel the effective implementation of the broad marketing campaign to increase the value and image of the brand through selection, evaluation and approval of te media according to the product profile: consumer, medical, shopper
To define the marketing plan (promotion, publicity, digital publicity, price, point of distribution) conferred to the profound understanding of the consumer to craft and strengthen the "love for the brand".
Conquer the medical community through a strategy and increase the prescription based on integral knowledge of the business model.
Assure the compliance of the marketing global strategy, adjusted to every countries needs.
To propel digital innovation via e-commerce and Omni channel strategies(e-reps, eCME, CME, newsletters, direct mail, etc).
Arrange, elaborate and manage the marketing budget with the purpose of optimizing management and carry out for the investment repayment (return on investment).
Flourish and lead the “Business Case” to endeavor the new product feasibility, as well as to aid identifying new growth opportunities that generate value for the assigned brands.
Lead, thrive and motivate your team.
Accomplish the Good Practices of Marketing based on the Compliance Officer regulation.
Follow the Environmental Management System of the department.
What we offer:
Significant work from your first day and every single day learning.
Environment multifunctional collaboration and high level of interaction with managers and directors who will develop your skills.
Competitive salary and a benefit package.
Dynamic and supportive international work environment ? employees are at the core, we value every individual and urge initiatives, promoting agility and work/life balance.

Gerente de Logística - Materiales Querétaro Salario no mostrado por compañía. Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Permanente,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Gerencia de Mercadotecnia Job Description
Los lugares de TrabajoMX-QUE-El Marques
Fecha de Publicación1 month ago(3/21/2019 8:39 PM)
ID2019-4820# De Aperturas1CategoríaLogistics
Descripción de la Empresa
Flex-N-Gate es una empresa líder en manufactura y proveedor de diversos componentes para la industria automotriz, actualmente se encuentra en la posición número 10 de los 150 Mejores Proveedores de Norte América según "Noticias Automotrices". Una importante compañía en crecimiento, Flex-N-Gate representa una gran oportunidad laboral para personas calificadas.
Responsabilidades
- Extensive experience in Materials Management, leading activities such as Planning, Receiving area, Production Scheduling, Customer Service, Shipping and Invoicing.
- Ability to coordinate several tasks simultaneously.
- Ability to handle challenges with proven history of increased productivity.
- Dynamic, results- oriented, problem solver.
- Extensive knowledge of fleet operations, including how they are best deployed to profitably support manufacturing operations.
- Ability to develop and direct staff to support an effective fleet operation.
- Knowledge of DOT rules and regulations as applicable to private fleet operations with ability to translate knowledge into compliant programs and operational practices.
- Ability to identify, document and correct practices in support of continuous improvement.
Perfil de puesto / Requerimientos / Conocimientos / Certificaciones
- 5-10 years as Materials Manager in automotive industry
- 3-5 years with analysis of traffic lanes, rate negotiations and carrier development.
- Bachelor Degree in business administration or industrial engineering.
- Excellent organizational and negotiation skills to effectively plan, organize and manage multiple projects and set priorities.
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
- Experience with all PC and MS office programs, AS400 and other related systems.
- Experience with ground transportation operations including DOT, OSHA and all related safety regulations.
- Ability to work in a fast paced environment, handle multiple tasks simultaneously, maintain highest work ethics, team oriented with strong interpersonal skills to develop relationships.
- Ability to read, analyzes, and interprets general business periodicals, professional journals, technical procedures, or governmental regulations.
- Demonstrated success in leading, supervising, managing and developing high performance teams.
- Completion of regulatory sponsored training programs applicable to fleet operations as they are published/made available. 
- Master Degree in Logistic, Administration or Industrial Engineering (desirable)
Prestaciones
Aguinaldo
Vacaciones
Prima Vacacional
Fondo de Ahorro (No aplica para todas las plantas)
Vales de Despensa
Seguro de Vida
Seguro de Gastos Médicos Mayores
Ámbito de aplicación de la Posición
Direct and coordinate the activities of the personnel involved in some or all of the following areas; Materials planning, distribution, inventory control,
material analysis, procurement and supply chain management are also responsible for managing all aspects of material flow to maintain control and accuracy of all merchandise inventories, including all the transactions, acquisitions, planning, programming, costs, warehouse, reception and shipment to guarantee that the orders of the clients are fulfilled in time. This position is also responsible for developing and managing all relationships with suppliers.

Marketing Communications Professional México Salario no mostrado por compañía. Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Permanente,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Telemarketing Act as trusted advisor for OpCo Management in all Communications activities. Support the positioning of the OpCo VP and other management team members in the region (e.g. BU Mgmt, BG mgmt.) by managing their relevant communications (e.g. speeches, speaker placement, presentations, and newsletter). Provide proactively feedback and advice. Ensure business proximity.

* Develop and implement Communications Strategy: Define target groups and develop a regional OpCo Communications strategy. Ensure that strategy is in line with the Siemens Country Communications Strategy and foster country, global campaigns and targets.
Define regional OpCo Communications targets on a yearly basis. Propose, negotiate and confirm the Communications budget for the fiscal year. Steer the development of the regional BU-specific Communications strategies if necessary.
Define KPI's and ensure measurement and reporting. Benchmark externally, especially towards main competitors. Drive innovations in the area of Communications (e.g. Lead management, Online Marketing, Social Media).

* Produce Communications Content: Drive the development of regional OpCo specific Communications content against the background of electrification, automation and digitalization. Foster production of content which is usable for various Communications channels. Cooperate closely in the production of new content with the local centers of Expertise (MarCom,Digital, External and Internal, etc.).

* Manage Communications activities: orchestrate all Communications activities towards the external and internal target groups - and across the various communications disciplines, channels and regions. Ensure homogeneity and seamlessness of all activities, not least by following global Governance Communications guidelines.
Develop detailed Communications concepts, messages and plans for the OpCo; make sure they are in alignment with Lead Country
Execute the Communications plans. Set up and steer 360° Communications projects if necessary. Coordinate Internal Communications of the OpCo. Contribute to country and global hotspots, messages and campaigns.
Share actively communications examples, content and best practices within the Communications Community. Collaborate also proactively with OpCo management of other function (e.g. Strategy, HR, BA, and Legal). Manage Budget: Allocate resources efficiently and ensure that CG forecasts and budget are met.

* Crisis Communications: Screen, identify and monitor potential cases of crisis Communications.
  Education
University studies in communications, media studies, or comparable field and several years of professional experience in internal or external communication
? Comprehensive understanding and knowledge of marketing
  Experience
? Independent development and implementation of internal and external communication strategies, development of briefings, independent guiding and monitoring of external communication agencies
? Plan budget of annually scheduled communication activities
Experience:
? Development of communication concepts and realization of communication projects required, management of external suppliers and project teams, collaboration with people from different cultures
Expertise:
? Consulting skills, structured and goal-oriented work ethic, creativity techniques, organizational and quality-oriented thinking, openness to new ideas

Editor de comunicación corporativa en tema de NEGOCIOS Ciudad de México (Distrito Federal) Salario no mostrado por compañía. Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Tiempo Completo, Permanente,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Mercadotecnia y Publicidad KPMG es Firma líder en servicios profesionales de Auditoría, Impuestos y Asesoría que ofrece a nuestros clientes experiencia global y un amplio conocimiento local. Tenemos presencia en más de 155 países siendo más de 155,000 profesionales y en México, contamos con oficinas en 18 estados con más 2,800 empleados. Estamos buscando un Editor de comunicación corporativa- Bilingüe   ¿Cuál sería tu propósito en este puesto? Contribuir al posicionamiento de marca mediante la generación de contenido de negocios que sea relevante para nuestro público objetivo y favorecer al cumplimiento de nuestra promesa de marca. ¿Qué funciones realizarías? Revisión y corrección de redacción, ortografía y estilo de diversos documentos, presentaciones, invitaciones, discursos, guiones etc. para diversas plataformas como digital, impreso, etc. tanto en inglés como en español sobre temas de negocio. Traducción y adecuaciones de textos en inglés al español y viceversa. Apoyo en la elaboración de discursos y guiones para material audiovisual diverso y para los líderes de la Firma, como de avisos electrónicos sobre temas de industria, en especial avisos sobre cuentas ganadas y en la edición de contenido editorial de la Firma (estudios, folletos, fact sheets, white papers). Revisión de materiales editoriales que generan las áreas adscritas a la Dirección de Mercadotecnia y Comunicación. Elaboración de discursos y guiones para material audiovisual diverso y para los líderes de la Firma.                                                                      ¿Qué requieres para el puesto? Ser titulado de la licenciatura en Periodismo, Literatura, Letras, Comunicación, Relaciones Internacionales, o afin. Tener un nivel avanzado de inglés y excelente redacción, capacidad creativa para la generación de contenido editorial. Contar con mínimo 3 años de experiencia en redacción y edición de textos, preferente de la fuente de negocios. Alta capacidad de síntesis y de tiempos de respuesta para las asignaciones designadas. Ser extremadamente organizado, motivado y enfocado a resultados. Te ofrecemos:Integrarte en una Firma Internacional de reconocido prestigio, con programas de formación continua, en un ambiente de alto nivel humano y profesional, que te permitirá desarrollar una brillante carrera profesional y una remuneración competitiva acorde con tu valía y experiencia.Si estás interesado aplica por este medio o envía tu CV al correo de contacto indicando nombre de la vacante en el asunto. KPMG es una firma incluyente, que valora la diversidad y no hace ningún tipo de discriminación.  AVISO IMPORTANTE Hacemos de su conocimiento que KPMG Cárdenas Dosal, S.C. (KPMG en México) nunca le solicitará información personal vía WhatsApp o a través de otro canal distinto al sitio web oficial de la Firma.El único canal oficial autorizado para recibir información para postularse a ofertas de empleo de KPMG en México es en nuestra página de internet dentro de la sección Carrera denominada Ofertas de Empleo. KPMG en México refrenda su compromiso de actuar con los más altos estándares éticos y con estricto apego a los lineamientos y disposiciones legales en materia de privacidad y protección de datos personales.

Specifically, this role is responsible for the successful completion and implementation of key initiatives, achieved through identifying, tracking, managing and resolving project issues or risks in a timely manner, and in keeping aligned within the processes of the cross-product Enterprise Program Management team. He/she ensures the health of all projects/programs are communicated in a concise, consistent and effective manner. He/she is responsible for organizing all projects/programs across all teams, disciplines, and stakeholders within the enterprise, to ensure all business objectives are met. The Enterprise Program Management (EPM) team executes on the DSS roadmap. The team acts on the strategic guidance provided by the DSS Executive Team. The team works with software development, infrastructure, business development, legal, finance and engineering teams. The EPM team brings value by providing clarity from executive level guidance to teams by facilitating priorities, reporting, communicating and evaluating status on the program. This is a high-profile group that is engaged with tactical teams to bring the desired results our customers, leadership and cast members want and expect.Responsibilities  Direct intra- and inter-team dependencies including non-technical (third party vendors, legal, etc..), highlight project blockers and risks and work with cross-functional teams to resolve them.Maintain a clear overview of project timelines (gantt charts, spreadsheets, etc.) and progress using task management tools (primarily Jira). This will include providing timely updates on the status of projects to a cross-functional audience.Create and maintain project documentation that is the single source of truth about a project to keep teams aligned and informed.Provide the required hands-on software development and project management, cross-functional coordination, and inter/intra team communications to deliver outstanding program outcomes.Work closely with leadership, software engineers, QA, product managers, Marketing business partners and data engineers to get high-quality products and features through the software project lifecycle (build, test and release on time).Lead project schedules, identify possible issues and clearly communicate them to project stakeholders.Tracks and manages dependencies across multiple projects; leads escalation processes to make issues visible to stakeholders and leadership; drives resolution of dependency issues through the process.Leads the overall project stage gate review process, through conducting readiness assessments to identifying gaps in readiness throughout the project life cycle.Coaches team members regarding unexpected variances, root causes, corrective actions/options, and impacts.Partner with project teams to identify interdependencies, conflicts and risks associated with delivery.Develops trusted partnerships with stakeholders by collaborating and delivering on common goals.Owns overall project communications, escalates risks and manages the issue resolution process.Ensure that projects and priorities support partner's strategic plans and each project is managed to ensure on-time implementation and flawless execution.Manage demand by working closely with all constituents to prioritize programs and projects based on business needs, resource capacity, risk exposure and interdependencies.Basic Qualifications The ideal candidate has an engineering or data background and deep understanding of marketing technology, with experience implementing third-party Marketing technology (ie, CRM systems and advertising optimization systems) and working with teams to build and deploy first-party technology. Experience working in marketing, advertising or CRM-centric environments is required.Strong account management, client service and/or management consulting experience.Program Lifecycle Disciplines: Strong knowledge of the integrated systems lifecycle development utilizing different ? and sometimes ? multiple development models (e.g., agile, waterfall, hybrid, etc.)Comfortable dealing with high-level executives, technical staff and business leadsDemonstrated ability in clearly articulating plans, concepts and activities to a broad/ diverse audience. Durante todo el proceso estaremos a tu lado.¡No te quedes fuera! Se parte de esta nueva experiencia, déjanos ser parte de tu nuevo reto.Conoce los retos de esta posición:? Dar seguimiento y soporte comercial a cuentas existentes.? Desarrollo y administración de cartera.? Planeación, coordinación y ejecución de la estrategia comercial trabajando en equipo con el área de marketing,finanzas y recursos humanos.? Visita con clientes para la presentación de servicios.? Cierre de venta? Investigar y estudiar el mercado enfocado al sector de servicios de Recursos Humanos.? Prospección y generación de nuevas cuentas y oportunidades comerciales.Nuestro Candidato Ideal:- Estudios: Licenciatura. Negocios internacionales, Relaciones comerciales, marketing - Experiencia Laboral: Mínimo un año - Conocimientos Específicos:  Manejo de Microsoft Office Manejo de CRM (deseable).- Habilidades: Trabajo orientado a resultados, trabajo en equipo, autodirigido.Horario Laboral: Lunes a Jueves 8:30-17:30, Viernes 8:00-15:00Beneficios:¿Qué ofrecemos?Salario competitivo. Prestaciones de ley. Apoyo con gastos médicos menores.Gran ambiente laboral.Nuestro proceso se lleva a cabo de la siguiente manera:1. Aplica a través del enlace. 2. Sube tu CV y contesta unas breves preguntas. 3. Realiza una pequeña vídeo entrevista y responde a unas pruebas. 4. Entrevista presencial (aplica para candidatos que hayan pasado los primeros puntos). 5. Revisión de referencias. 6. Internamente se hace una evaluación y se toma una decisión. 7. Se notificará el resultado. 8. Ingreso. Durante todo el proceso tendrás comunicación vía correo electrónico sobre tu progreso.

Brand Manager Búho Soda Querétaro, Querétaro $9,000 - $12,000 Mensual más comisiones Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Tiempo Completo, Permanente, Honorarios Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Telemarketing ¡Somos Búho!Búho Soda es la nueva generación en refrescos: naturales, refrescantes, sanos y despiertos. Así como son nuestros productos somos cada uno de nosotros en Mima Sodas S.A. de C.V., empresa propietaria de la marca Búho Soda. Nuestro trabajo se forma por la creatividad y dinámica que solamente una start-up puede ofrecer. Innovación, flexibilidad y una buena porción de responsabilidad nos caracterizan, así como los valores que compartimos: honestidad, espíritu de equipo y la motivación para crear mejores productos en el mundo. ¿Eres Búho? Si cuentas con los siguientes requisitos ¡tú eres a quien buscamos!Tienes un mínimo de 3 años de experiencia como Brand Manager en el mercado nacional e internacional de bebidas o otros FMCG.Manejas el inglés al 100%.Eres una persona dinámica, comunicativa y te puedes identificar con una marca joven como es Búho Soda.Te gusta viajar y puedes manejar horarios flexibles. Tienes una personalidad segura, positiva y agradable.Eres fiable y puedes organizar tu trabajo con responsabilidad propia e independiente.Manejas Microsoft Office.Vives en la Ciudad de Querétaro.¿Qué vas a hacer?Vas a ser responsable del marketing para la marca Búho Soda en el mercado nacional e internacional. Desarrollar la estrategia de marketing nacional e internacional para la marca.Desarrollar medidas para la promoción comercial de la marca, en especial en centros de consumo (HORECA / on-premise) y online.Desarrollar la estrategia de inbound marketing. Elaborar evaluaciones cuantitativas y cualitativas de las medidas implementadas y derivación de mejores continuas. Desarrollar estudios de mercado y de competitividad, así como identificar nuevos mercados.Representar la marca en eventos y con clientes junto con nuestro equipo de ventas. Si estás dispuesto a poner toda tu energía, pasión y profesionalismo en un proyecto joven e interesante, y para ti una empresa es más que un trabajo, ¡mándanos tu CV y una carta de presentación personal, así como por que te gustaría trabajar con Búho!* Ofrecemos un proyecto que te hará crecer como persona y profesional; mediante compensaciones atractivas, prestaciones y oportunidades de crecimiento reales. *Solamente atenderemos aplicaciones que cumplan con los requisitos.

Dominio del inglés en todos los aspectos. 
 
 Alto Enfoque a clientes internos y externos, impulsados por resultados.

Work From Home as Bilingual Marketing Assistant Cuauhtémoc, Ciudad de México (Distrito Federal) $10,000 - $15,000 Mensual  Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Tiempo Completo, Permanente,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Telemarketing This will probably be the longest, most honest and detailed, employment ad you will ever read.We did this so that you don't waste your time applying for a job that you know, deep down, is not for you.We want to lay it out from the get go - what type of person we are looking for and what we expect from you.If you are up for a job that is as demanding as it is rewarding, please continue reading the rest of this ad. If you are up to the challenge, we look forward to receiving your application, resume and cover letter.To those of you who read this entire ad and apply for the position, we thank you in advance and look forward to meeting you. We are looking to hire offshore talent for the position of Marketing Assistant.This is not a temporary position, the successful applicant will become an integral part of our team.We are looking for a hardworking, detail-oriented individual to be our staff.What will you do?Our Marketing Assistant helps plan and implement our marketing and advertising activities. They plan events, write copy, post on social media and assist us in keeping our company visible and connected to our clients and prospects. For this role, you should be comfortable with various social media platforms.You will handle direct interaction with clients and parties to transactions here in the US once you have been trained and established your proficiency in the English and Spanish.What are some characteristics that you should have?You will need to speak English and Spanish clearly. You will need strong grammar and writing skills in both English and Spanish.You must be a positive person. If you see the glass as being half full, you are the type of person we are looking for. Our office does not do well with toxic or negative attitudes, complainers or victims, and you will not fit in if you even think that you may fit into one of the above categories of negative people.You must be competent and proficient in the use of Facebook and Instagram at a minimum. The more computer experience with social media the better. We prefer people who are not afraid of computers or learning new things that will make their jobs easier.If you lose stuff, are not organized, and get easily distracted, please don't apply.You need to be detail oriented and willing to go the extra mile to get the job done right the first time. In our practice getting it done right the first time for our clients is very important and we need everyone to work with this goal in mind. If this seems too much to ask of you, don't apply for this job. As a way to test your attention to detail we have included a question on our application which reads “Do you feel attention to detail is important?” Please answer this question by placing the words “Apple Pie” and nothing else in the space provided for your answer.You must be a team player. We are strong believers in the team approach, so if you are not a team player, this is not the job for you. You need to be able to interact with people in a manner that is polite, educated, and puts them at ease.You cannot talk down to anyone that you deal with in our office. You need to have compassion when dealing with those you meet as part of our team.Your ability to listen to what you are being told and ask follow up questions is very important. If you cannot listen, understand, evaluate and interview someone, this is not the job for you.You MUST be able to handle working with several different databases of information. If you aren't 100% confident managing data and people, you are not the right person for this job.At times, you will also need to know how to figure things out on your own, creatively problem solve and come up with solutions.To put it simply, we want you to earn what we are paying you. We don't want to pay you to socialize, surf the Internet, e-mail friends and family, work for another company or any other non-work related activities while you are on the clock for us. This does not mean it is not fun to be on our team, it just means we know when we have to work and we know when to have fun.If this sounds harsh or unfair, then this is not the job for you.At this point some of you may be thinking that this job will be the worst job in the world. If you are, this is not the job for you.If, on the other hand, you realize that such a team will help you get your job done efficiently and also have a life outside of work, then you are the type of candidate we would like to discuss the opportunity we are offering.If you are hired, you will be part of a wonderful team of people, who work hard to get the job done right the first time and take pride in the work that they do. You will be part of a team that is rewarded for their hard work.Regarding compensation, it is negotiable based upon experience and is subject to review after 90 days. The starting pay range is $400 US Dollars a month during training. After 90 days, if you have completed your training and established yourself as a valuable member of the team you will receive an increase of salary to $800 a month.You will be challenged but you will have fun and you will enjoy helping our clients.If you have gotten this far, you are truly an exceptional worker looking for a professional team, as most people will have stopped reading this ad a long time ago. You want to be part of a team where your hard work and efforts are recognized, appreciated and rewarded.HOW TO APPLY:To apply for a position at our Firm, please go to the following url, fill out our application and link the necessary documents.bit(dot)ly/2RdecJzThe application requires you to attach two photos one of yourself and on of your workstation. For the photo of you please hold a sheet of paper which says “US Dream Job”. For the photo of your desk please put a sheet of paper on your desk which reads “US Dream Job” so that it can be seen in the photo. Thank you for taking the time to read this entire ad. If you decide to apply we look forward to meeting you.

Gerente de Operación de Gestión Económica de Tecnología 1 México Salario no mostrado por compañía. Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Permanente,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Gerencia de Mercadotecnia NOMBRE DEL CARGO: Gerente de Operación de Gestión Económica de Tecnología

 

LUGAR DE TRABAJO: Santa Fe

 

INTRODUCCIÓN DE LA EMPRESA

 

Grupo Telefónica con operaciones en México desde hace 15 años a través de su marca Movistar, es una empresa líder en telecomunicaciones con presencia en 21 países que con espíritu innovador e inmenso potencial tecnológico ofrece soluciones de vanguardia.

 

Si eres una persona a la que le gustan los retos, abierta a los cambios e innovadora ¡Telefónica México es el mejor lugar para ti!

 

Te estamos buscando para desarrollar el puesto: Gerente de Operación de Gestión Económica de Tecnología

 

REQUISITOS

Escolaridad: Licenciatura en Administración de Empresas o Contabilidad, Ingeniería Industrial o Telecomunicaciones

 

Experiencia: +5 años en áreas de financieras, contraloría, planificación y control presupuestal

 

Competencias:


	Organización y planificación: Capacidad de coordinar diversas actividades al mismo tiempo que permitan cumplir en tiempo y forma con los requerimientos del área
	Capacidad de análisis: Habilidad de sintetizar, proponer y transmitir información relevante para habilitar la toma de decisiones de la dirección
	Toma de decisiones: Resolver de forma óptima y ágil las incertidumbres y problemas inherentes a la gestión
	Trabajo en equipo: Coordinar equipo propio y de otras áreas para alcanzar resultados de manera eficiente
	Resolución de conflictos: Manejar de forma conciliadora diferencias con diversas áreas
	Gestión del cambio: Buscar constantemente la mejora y optimización de la gestión y los procesos más allá de su área de control


 

Conocimiento:


	Suite de Microsoft Office con desempeño avanzado en Excel, Power Point y Outlook
	Flujos de gestión económica desde asignaciones de presupuesto hasta pago a proveedores
	Manejo de SAP con profundidad en módulos de SRM y RE
	Financiero: OpEx y CapEx de tecnología, estado de ganancias y pérdidas, efectos cambiarios, construcción de casos de negocio, capitalizaciones de activos


 

Funciones:


	Garantizar la correcta ejecución de la operación de la gestión económica del área de tecnología
	Validar las necesidades de inversión y gasto requeridas por las áreas operativas versus lo establecido por área de planificación y definir un plan de compras acorde a estas
	Asegurar cumplimiento del flujo de trabajo de la liberación de cestas, traspasos, derivados, aceptaciones y pagos
	Coordinar con áreas operativa la correcta carga de información requerida para la asignación de recursos para los proyectos
	Cumplir con seguimiento y pago de arrendamientos de terceros y otros gastos (energía, servicios, etc.)
	Supervisar la ejecución de capitalizaciones de activos de la empresa y seguimiento de inventarios
	Dar soporte a las actividades financieras mensuales de cierre contable
	Proveer de información ejecutiva del área que permita dar visibilidad a la salud de la gestión económica de tecnología

Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Tiempo Completo,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Mercadotecnia de Eventos BASIC FUNCTION Under the direction of the Associate Director-Marketing, Latin America the Senior Market Analyst is responsible for assisting in developing and coordinating the implementation of short and long-term marketing strategic plans and programs to ensure customer satisfaction, satisfy market potential, and obtain the desired profit, market penetration and growth.Required to maintain a cooperative relationship with Sales Administration, Field Sales, Communications, Legal, Manufacturing, International Traffic, Market Research, Engineering, Accounting and Product Marketing teams. SPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES Provide solid business and marketing analysis in all phases of marketing processes by providing reports and drawing conclusions that capture a clear picture of the competitive environment and market share. This will assist in the development of Market development and growth initiatives.Develop, analyze, and maintain statistics obtained from trade publications, government reports, competitive price sheets, visits to distributors and trade shows, etc. showing trends and conditions based on sales.Develop awareness of competitive products, pricing, performance, and market share including trends in product design, architecture, interiors, living environments, etc. for the purpose of drawing conclusions on product continuance or modifications, market potential, etc. This includes preparing product positioning charts by market/product line.Prepare annual unit plans by market and assist with financial planning.Analyze performance of each product or channel in terms of profitability, volume contribution to product line or channel, and its potential, and draw conclusions, where applicable, on product line extensions and discontinuations or more emphasis on marketing programs. This includes conducting product line reviews to manage the product offering for various markets/distributors.Responsible of engaging in the New Product Schedule cycle with Product Marketing and engaging in product development teams to launch products within the schedule.Prepare pricing analysis and recommendations appropriate to the Market conditions and profitability expectations. This includes pricing and foreign source program ACTs.Maintain contact with customers, sales, trade groups, engineering, and all other internal and external sources which can contribute to the development of new product ideas to satisfy consumer needs, are marketable, and provide for Kohler Co. growth and increased profit.Assist in developing product launch toolsIdentify opportunities to increase product margins.Maintain awareness of legislation, trade group agreements, federal, state and local codes, etc. that may affect marketing of products and recommend the necessary action.Partner with Market Research to perform trend research, provide analysis of sales records, determine market potential, identify consumer needs, etc.EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTSRequires a Bachelor's degree in marketing or related field.  1 to 3 years of marketing experience with progressively more responsibility and a track record of results is required. Must possess a keen analytical mind, be strong on planning, detail, and accuracy, and be a demonstrably creative thinker.  Must possess substantial skills in written and oral communication with all levels of management and with outside contacts.Must be 100% bilingual English/Spanish  TRAVELTravel to trade shows, manufacturing plants, and customer visits as needed, approximately 10-30%. /US Visa is required

Consultor en sustentabilidad, financiamiento y logística Ciudad de México (Distrito Federal) Salario no mostrado por compañía. Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Tiempo Completo, Honorarios Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Investigación y Análisis de Mercado I. Acerca de TechnoServe: TechnoServe es una organización internacional sin fines de lucro cuya misión es ayudar a emprendedores a que desarrollen negocios exitosos y sostenibles que generen empleos, ingresos y oportunidades para las personas de escasos recursos. De ésta forma, se busca mejorar su calidad de vida y garantizar un mejor futuro para sus familias. Nuestro equipo global trabaja arduamente para transferir los beneficios del desarrollo del sector privado a las regiones de menos recursos del mundo. Nuestra estrategia se basa en un enfoque de mercado y de resultados empresariales misma que ha sido implementada y afinada en más de 30 países.II. Descripción del programa: En este proyecto, TechnoServe colaborará con una empresa privada durante un periodo de 12 meses. La empresa busca promover el crecimiento económico de la zona donde se localiza mediante el fortalecimiento de pequeñas empresas locales que a la vez, puedan fungir como proveedores de su red de abastecimiento.Las metas principales del programa son apoyar el desarrollo de pequeñas empresas de la zona, facilitar el proceso de proveeduría local de la compañía así como impulsar los sectores económicos clave de la región. Los objetivos específicos consideran el incremento de las ventas de las empresas participantes.El proyecto proporcionará servicios de asesoría de negocios a los empresarios que sean beneficiarios del programa, brindando la guía para una efectiva implementación de sus proyectos de negocios. Se busca lograr el desarrollo y/o fortalecimiento de habilidades operativas y estratégicas en las PYMEs participantes, capacitando y asesorándoles integralmente en las principales áreas: mercadeo y ventas, costos y finanzas, operaciones, aspectos legales para operar la empresa, desarrollo de redes comerciales, así como el establecimiento y monitoreo de indicadores de medición del desempeño de la operación del negocio.III. Descripción del puestoEl Consultor durante 3 meses realizará un estudio en alguno de los siguientes temas:1.      Adaptación al cambio climático e indicadores de sustentabilidad2.      Participación de jóvenes3.      Acceso al financiamiento de PYMEs4.      Logística en cadenas de valorEl consultor será responsable de todos los entregables, incluyendo productos y resultados específicos que se detallen en la propuesta del estudio. Además de ejecutar las actividades de planeación, investigación y ejecución necesarias para completar el estudio. IV. Experiencia y habilidades requeridas:Amplio conocimiento en alguno de los siguientes tópicos o en temas relacionados (incluyendo estrategias cuantitativas, cualitativas, y participativas) :o Adaptación al cambio climático e indicadores de sustentabilidado Participación de jóveneso Acceso al financiamiento de PYMEso Logística en cadenas de valor·        Estudios en ciencias sociales, economía, agronomía, ciencias ambientales o áreas relevantes para la temática de al menos uno de los estudios.·        Al menos 3 años de experiencia profesional en planeación estratégica, investigación y/o consultoría ·        Experiencia en procesos de documentación, sistematización de información y elaboración de documentos.·        Amplias habilidades analíticas·        Interés en impacto en desarrollo económico·        Disponibilidad para viajar·        Capacidad organizativa del tiempo y el trabajo.·        Proactividad y trabajo autónomo.·        Discreción y manejo de información confidencial.·        Iniciativa y creatividad·        Dominio fluido del español y de inglés. Deseable:·        Experiencia en desarrollo de estrategias para el fortalecimiento de empresas preferiblemente con énfasis en sustentabilidad, acceso a financiamiento, cadenas de valor o relacionados·        Conocimiento y experiencia con acceso a mercados, de sectores de negocio como: agro-negocios, energía, educación, vivienda, salud.·        Experiencia en proyectos con la pequeña y mediana empresa. VI. Indicaciones para postularse a la vacante:Aquellos candidatos que cumplan con las características arriba descritas deberán enviar su Curriculum Vitae a la siguiente dirección. Por favor incluya el nombre de la vacante a la cual se postula en el asunto del correo. Únicamente aquellos candidatos que cumplan con los requisitos solicitados serán considerados y/o contactados. Empleador con Igualdad de oportunidades para minorías, mujeres e individuos con discapacidad.

Editor de comunicación corporativa Ciudad de México (Distrito Federal) Salario no mostrado por compañía. Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Tiempo Completo, Permanente,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Mercadotecnia y Publicidad  KPMG es Firma líder en servicios profesionales de Auditoría, Impuestos y Asesoría que ofrece a nuestros clientes experiencia global y un amplio conocimiento local. Tenemos presencia en más de 155 países siendo más de 155,000 profesionales y en México, contamos con oficinas en 18 estados con más 2,800 empleados.   Estamos buscando un Editor de comunicación corporativa- Bilingüe      ¿Cuál sería tu propósito en este puesto?  Contribuir al posicionamiento de marca mediante la generación de contenido de negocios que sea relevante para nuestro público objetivo y favorecer al cumplimiento de nuestra promesa de marca.    ¿Qué funciones realizarías?  Revisión y corrección de redacción, ortografía y estilo de diversos documentos, presentaciones, invitaciones, discursos, guiones etc. para diversas plataformas como digital, impreso, etc. tanto en inglés como en español sobre temas de negocio. Traducción y adecuaciones de textos en inglés al español y viceversa. Apoyo en la elaboración de discursos y guiones para material audiovisual diverso y para los líderes de la Firma, como de avisos electrónicos sobre temas de industria, en especial avisos sobre cuentas ganadas y en la edición de contenido editorial de la Firma (estudios, folletos, fact sheets, white papers). Revisión de materiales editoriales que generan las áreas adscritas a la Dirección de Mercadotecnia y Comunicación. Elaboración de discursos y guiones para material audiovisual diverso y para los líderes de la Firma.                                                                         ¿Qué requieres para el puesto?  Ser titulado de la licenciatura en Periodismo, Literatura, Letras, Comunicación, Relaciones Internacionales, o afin. Tener un nivel avanzado de inglés y excelente redacción, capacidad creativa para la generación de contenido editorial. Contar con mínimo 3 años de experiencia en redacción y edición de textos, preferente de la fuente de negocios. Alta capacidad de síntesis y de tiempos de respuesta para las asignaciones designadas. Ser extremadamente organizado, motivado y enfocado a resultados.    Te ofrecemos:  Integrarte en una Firma Internacional de reconocido prestigio, con programas de formación continua, en un ambiente de alto nivel humano y profesional, que te permitirá desarrollar una brillante carrera profesional y una remuneración competitiva acorde con tu valía y experiencia.  Si estás interesado aplica por este medio o envía tu CV al correo de contacto indicando nombre de la vacante en el asunto.   KPMG es una firma incluyente, que valora la diversidad y no hace ningún tipo de discriminación.     AVISO IMPORTANTE   Hacemos de su conocimiento que KPMG Cárdenas Dosal, S.C. (KPMG en México) nunca le solicitará información personal vía WhatsApp o a través de otro canal distinto al sitio web oficial de la Firma. El único canal oficial autorizado para recibir información para postularse a ofertas de empleo de KPMG en México es en nuestra página de internet dentro de la sección Carrera denominada Ofertas de Empleo. KPMG en México refrenda su compromiso de actuar con los más altos estándares éticos y con estricto apego a los lineamientos y disposiciones legales en materia de privacidad y protección de datos personales.

Copy de comunicación corporativa Ciudad de México (Distrito Federal) Salario no mostrado por compañía. Descripción de la vacante Contratación: Tiempo Completo, Permanente,  Categoría: Mercadotecnia, Publicidad y Relaciones Públicas,  Relaciones Públicas  KPMG es Firma líder en servicios profesionales de Auditoría, Impuestos y Asesoría que ofrece a nuestros clientes experiencia global y un amplio conocimiento local. Tenemos presencia en más de 155 países siendo más de 155,000 profesionales y en México, contamos con oficinas en 18 estados con más 2,800 empleados.   Estamos buscando un Editor de comunicación corporativa- Bilingüe      ¿Cuál sería tu propósito en este puesto?  Contribuir al posicionamiento de marca mediante la generación de contenido de negocios que sea relevante para nuestro público objetivo y favorecer al cumplimiento de nuestra promesa de marca.    ¿Qué funciones realizarías?  Revisión y corrección de redacción, ortografía y estilo de diversos documentos, presentaciones, invitaciones, discursos, guiones etc. para diversas plataformas como digital, impreso, etc. tanto en inglés como en español sobre temas de negocio. Traducción y adecuaciones de textos en inglés al español y viceversa. Apoyo en la elaboración de discursos y guiones para material audiovisual diverso y para los líderes de la Firma, como de avisos electrónicos sobre temas de industria, en especial avisos sobre cuentas ganadas y en la edición de contenido editorial de la Firma (estudios, folletos, fact sheets, white papers). Revisión de materiales editoriales que generan las áreas adscritas a la Dirección de Mercadotecnia y Comunicación. Elaboración de discursos y guiones para material audiovisual diverso y para los líderes de la Firma.                                                                         ¿Qué requieres para el puesto?  Ser titulado de la licenciatura en Periodismo, Literatura, Letras, Comunicación, Relaciones Internacionales, o afin. Tener un nivel avanzado de inglés y excelente redacción, capacidad creativa para la generación de contenido editorial. Contar con mínimo 3 años de experiencia en redacción y edición de textos, preferente de la fuente de negocios. Alta capacidad de síntesis y de tiempos de respuesta para las asignaciones designadas. Ser extremadamente organizado, motivado y enfocado a resultados.    Te ofrecemos:  Integrarte en una Firma Internacional de reconocido prestigio, con programas de formación continua, en un ambiente de alto nivel humano y profesional, que te permitirá desarrollar una brillante carrera profesional y una remuneración competitiva acorde con tu valía y experiencia.  Si estás interesado aplica por este medio o envía tu CV al correo de contacto indicando nombre de la vacante en el asunto.   KPMG es una firma incluyente, que valora la diversidad y no hace ningún tipo de discriminación.     AVISO IMPORTANTE   Hacemos de su conocimiento que KPMG Cárdenas Dosal, S.C. (KPMG en México) nunca le solicitará información personal vía WhatsApp o a través de otro canal distinto al sitio web oficial de la Firma. El único canal oficial autorizado para recibir información para postularse a ofertas de empleo de KPMG en México es en nuestra página de internet dentro de la sección Carrera denominada Ofertas de Empleo. KPMG en México refrenda su compromiso de actuar con los más altos estándares éticos y con estricto apego a los lineamientos y disposiciones legales en materia de privacidad y protección de datos personales.
